website_summaries.verdict: For those who plan on preparing large family meals or tailgate parties, this is the one for high volume grilling.
pros: of cooking space is very generous
Top-mounted indicator light shows power and heating readiness
Dual heating from top and bottom plates
cons: Nonstick coating can wear off faster than expected

customer_reviews.title: Terrible workmanship...but, hold on a minute!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the quality. Fell apart in less than 2 weeks. I expected more. Would not recommend this product. A follow up...I was contacted after my review by Spectrum Brands. They wanted to make sure that all was handled, so a new grill is shipping to me today. As a business man, this is exactly how I would handle this situation, and I commend them for caring enough to reach out!!
customer_reviews.author: Ravematic101

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because we had a personal George Foreman that we've been using for about 6 years now. We used it to grill chicken, burgers, toast sandwiches, etc. Dinner was ready in minutes. The only thing was that the personal grill was too small, so we decided to upgrade to this larger one and give away the personal one. Within two WEEKS of using the grill every other day, a screw on the hinge fell out. I tried to screw it back in, but it keeps falling out, so I believe the plastic has worn down. The grill still works, but the lid is a bit wobbly. Pretty disappointing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kay P

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far I have used this grill three times while cooking bacon, pork loins, and steak. This grill is fantastic. You can cook your food with the lid either open or closed depending on the effect you are looking for. The grill cooks evenly which is a big time plus! Clean up is easy as well. The grill is truly nonstick. I highly recommend this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: THIS BREAKS  THE SCREWS  FALL OUT AND THE FOREMAN FALLS APART AFTER 4 USES
customer_reviews.text: We were happy to buy this foreman to replace our first foreman. It is large like our first one. But we used it about 4 timers and then the screws fell out, so the topic it completely falls apart. The screws were metal, but the piece they were screwed into was plastic and it broke. It is impossible to fix it as the plastic pasts broke. Do Not buy this. It is cheaply made and will not last longer Han a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: TooTall51

customer_reviews.title: The first grill and a replacement grill-both defective.
customer_reviews.text: The first grill came with a crack on the top and no recipe book. Top of the box was loose And not securely closed with tape. Returned that day to Amazon and received a replacement in two days. Second grill still wasn’t taped securely, did not have an on off switch as indicated on the picture that came with the grill. Unfortunately will order from a different site.
customer_reviews.author: intelaware

customer_reviews.title: No on/off switch. Plates cannot be removed.
customer_reviews.text: Booklet shows an on/off switch. There is NO on/off switch. You plug it in to start. Unplug to turn off. Cooking plates are not removable so it is tough not to make a mess when cleaning. 800 number was no help.
customer_reviews.author: George Vandling

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Had this not even 6 months and it is unusable. First the light broke on it about 3 months ago and last night when I went to open it, the plastic casing for the lid broke off. I can't use it at all. I had to use an oven mitt to open the lid so I could get my food out before it burned. We only used it under 30 times in the past 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Stringer

customer_reviews.title: It is a George Foreman!  Whats'not to love?
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered this product for my son who lives in an apartment. He is not allowed to have a grill on the patio, and so I decided that this would be a good alternative! He got it so quickly, and it came in great condition! He was so excited he splurged on a nice steak for dinner! He said that it got good an hot for that steak sizzle, and good his food perfectly! He also said it was EASY clean up with a paper towel when warm. Love that this Mom could make my kid (he is 24!) with a reasonably priced, well constructed item! Long Live George!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia H

customer_reviews.title: A Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my son/family. They are very happy with it and use it quite often - especially now, when it's too cold to use the outdoor grill. They have had one of these grills in the past and it served them well, so I did not hesitate to order this new model. Everything cooks evenly and clean-up as my son puts it - "is a snap"!! I would have given it 5 stars but for the fact that "I" had not used, so "4 stars" it is !!!
customer_reviews.author: FlGal91

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Warranty
customer_reviews.text: My wife absolutely loves this grill. She was very disappointed when it made an electrical popping sound and stopped working. I looked at it and found there was an issue with the power cord in the hinge. My first thought was to just throw it away, but instead I looked up the order on Amazon and found it had about three months left on the two year warranty. I went to the web page link shown in the warranty and posted what happened. They sent us a brand new grill. It's really nice, and surprising, to have a company stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: it cooks very nicely. However
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a Christmas gift for my daughter and son -in -law. Recently I visited them and they were using this for the second time and the whole thing came apart. Each time we used the George and needed to clean it, it came apart. Apparently the crews are too short and they keep falling out. Otherwise, it cooks very nicely. However, it is hard using a product that needs reassembling every time you use it.
customer_reviews.author: D.C

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product - Not as reliable as previous Foreman's we've had.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these that have quit working withing the last two months. The first one we ordered quit heating on its 4th or 5th use. Amazon sent us a replacement, and now the second one quit heating after 10-15 uses. We have had Foreman's in the past that have lasted many years. Unfortunately this model appears to be defective.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning is a challenge but overall I love it for its capacity.
customer_reviews.text: This product works extremely efficiently and is perfect for feeding the family. If you need to cook more food at once this is the choice for you. I can usually fit about 5 frozen burger patties at the same time on the cooking surface. Cleaning is a bit challenging because the grill plates are attached to the unit and I try not to submerge the unit. Requires some finesse to get the soap rinsed off. I use a soft blue sponge and soft bristle cleaning brush to clean. The drip tray is dishwasher safe, however, I usually just clean it by hand.
customer_reviews.author: LadyBulldog

customer_reviews.title: Not an easy clean
customer_reviews.text: You can’t control the temperate but you can watch your food while you cook so to me this is really a non-issue. BUT what is an issue —the grills are NOT removable so it is difficult to clean. Yeah... you can use foil to minimize clean up but... I wish I knew the grills could not come out... I would not have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The grill heats really fast and cleanup is super easy.
customer_reviews.text: This isn't my first George Foreman......Which is why I didn't hesitate when I needed to purchase another. The grill heats really fast and cleanup is super easy....The only problem I find is that the grill isn't made of the same quality...... The stainless look is easy to scratch and the handle is flimsy as well. Even with these small issues I would still purchase this grill again.
customer_reviews.author: Philip3717

customer_reviews.title: Very basic. Works fine.
customer_reviews.text: This works fine, but as with anything this big and heavy that doesn't come apart and isn't machine washable, it's a pain to clean. Wish the plates removed. Also wish there were a temperature control, so I could prevent food burning on the outside before it's cooked completely at center. Too lazy to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grill although a little bigger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Like other Geroge Foreman grills this is an easy convenient way to grill. It was larger than I expected which isn't a problem but make sure to save room in the cupboards for it. If you are looking for a large George Foreman grill then this is perfect for you. Easily makes 8 quarter pound burgers at once
customer_reviews.author: Lucas McLaird

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Indoor Cooking
customer_reviews.text: I've cooked with this twice. The first thing I cooked was chopped steak, it turned out just fine, but what I was curious about was if it would cook my shishkabob. I skewered shrimp, pineapple, red bell pepper, mushroom, and onion, brushed olive oil over it all, and it cooked up perfectly. Shrimp doesn't take long to cook, and I was worried that it wouldn't soften the onion very much. It came out beautifully and most delicious. Everything cooked to perfection. Though the skewer closest to the opening needed another minute longer than the others. I feel like if it can cook a shrimp-kabob so well, chicken and other burgers will be a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Redd =)

customer_reviews.title: Great for so many foods!
customer_reviews.text: Quesadillas, cuts of meat, grilled cheese, we can easily cook so many things in here! The nonstick surface is great and it doesn't burn things the way an oven or stove will if you leave food a little too long. Cooking on both sides is great too, food cooks quickly
customer_reviews.author: dkimbrell

customer_reviews.title: Raw meat + Forman Grill= TASTY
customer_reviews.text: Before we bought this Forman grill, all of our hamburgers were cold and raw. The kids dreaded having hamburgers as did I. With this grill, I throw raw hamburger patties on and the turn all brown and juicey. Sometime we get creative and put cheese on the patties. Now the kids love hamburger night. I wish Forman made something for pan cakes.
customer_reviews.author: Bjj

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best cooking tools I have
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Question: How do you turn it on? Answer: You plug it in. Question: How do you adjust the temperature? Answer: You don't. Just plug it in. Question: How do I cook with it? Answer: Simple, plug it in and put the meat in it. This is a product you can use immediately without reading the instructions. It's fast. It cooks meat evenly, quickly, and it is mess free. I love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hollander

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Love to use this. Cooks to perfection, know matter what we grill it always taste great.
customer_reviews.author: aquarius

customer_reviews.title: ... a smaller George foreman grill we had and I love the large size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a smaller George foreman grill we had and I love the large size. My old George foreman had removable plates which was so much easier for cleaning, hence my one star deduction. This is a little bit of a pain to clean, but I still use it for so many cooking applications. It drains grease and cooks from the top and bottom at the same time to finish your foods faster. To me, that is worth the extra clean-up work.
customer_reviews.author: sadams1011

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous grill--no issues
customer_reviews.text: The grill works perfectly and cleans in a fraction of the time my other foreman grill took. To clean just let it cool (opened)right after you finish grilling, remove plates and pour water over surface and let sit a couple of minutes. Plates come clean with a sponge.
customer_reviews.author: tcbphd

customer_reviews.title: Great but...
customer_reviews.text: Because its big, its difficult to wash in the sink, and there is no taking it apart. It is easy to wipe down. There is no temperature control. Still is a great product. Makes meal prep or cooking a quick meal a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great for cooking both sides of the meat at the same time.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The 2nd George Foreman grill I've owned. I wore my other one completely out. This one has a larger cooking surface so no complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: PJLG

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and great replacement
customer_reviews.text: Have had this exact same grill before, it lasted a few years before it finally just wasn't cooking on both sides. So I finally bought this one and it's just as great as our first one. Worth the price for so much that we grilled without having to pull out the big grill.
customer_reviews.author: ID

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: It's been a while since I had a small George Foreman. I wanted to get this large one. The food that I have cooked has turned out great. The grates are not removable in this one, so a little cumbersome to clean. Highly recommend cleaning immediately after use as it is much easier to clean. A temperature control would be nice. All you do is plug it in and it heats up. All in all, I am pleased thus far.
customer_reviews.author: First_time_shopper

customer_reviews.title: Fast
customer_reviews.text: I have had a George Foreman grill since they first came out and love how fast and tasty everything I've cooked on it come out. The old one stopped working after about 40 yrs. and had to get a new one. I wasn't let down with this new one.
customer_reviews.author: Betty J Skellenger

customer_reviews.title: George Foreman Grill.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I cook hamburgers and steaks and they come out juicy and hot, with lots of flavor. I also discovered a way to cook with my grill with out having to clean it thoroughly. I use aluminum foil on my grill with some non-stick and it does a great job. I also don't need any bells and whistles on my griller. I just preheat between 5- 8 minutes and you are ready to go and when you are finished just unplug and wipe any leftover mess with a damp cloth and you are finished. I do recommend this Grill to anybody who needs one.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for my old unit
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for my old unit. Lots of grill space. I have not experienced sticking problems yet (because this is new), but I imagine the non-stick coating will eventually wear off... I had problems with the detachable ceramic plate model in the past, so I switched back to this type.
customer_reviews.author: WendyRW

customer_reviews.title: four years later.....
customer_reviews.text: I use this grill several times a month all year, and have since I purchased it in December 2013. I love the grill, but after four years of cleaning it, the coating is coming off the plates, and I was looking for this size with removable plates. But they don't make it. The five-serving size is too small... I can fit five frozen (large) burgers and two hot dogs on this grill, and can't make do with anything smaller. I may just have to break down and get a new one with the same features.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Averill

customer_reviews.title: George Foreman Grill is the best
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item which is outstanding. Product was delivered securely and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy14221

customer_reviews.title: Bacon cooked nice and crisp
customer_reviews.text: Cooks food quickly and evenly. Meat remains tender. Cooks at least 6 6oz steaks or chops at same time. Bacon cooked nice and crisp. A must have now for my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Calvillo

customer_reviews.title: Love my foreman!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love using this product. It is so easy to clean and so convenient to use. I cooked steaks, shrimp, and fish on this and it came out amazing- looks like I grilled on regular bbq grill. Highly recommend it esp when its too cold or too hot to be cooking outside.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Very handy, convenient and easy to use grill! We have had other George Foreman grills/ models and they'd all lasted for a while. We decided to upgrade and get a bigger indoor grill and are happy with that decision and the purchase. Holds a lot of items at one time and thus, cuts grilling/ cooking time. This is easy to clean and the food tastes good too. Would recommend. Thank You! Also, the price seemed very reasonable and the delivery was fast too.
customer_reviews.author: ssg

customer_reviews.title: The new one does not come with an on and off button in the back like my first one
customer_reviews.text: I had this product before thats why I order another one. The new one does not come with an on and off button in the back like my first one. The instructions and information on amazon say that it comes with one but it does not. Do now I have to unplug it from the wall instead. I love my old products but not happy with the new one.
customer_reviews.author: Maria P.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: we use this a few times a weeks works perfectly. easy to use (idiot proof really) easy to clean.... well kind of when i clean it the top seems to drip and run down the back of the bottom plate. the hinge area is getting kind of gnarly with the left over grease and oils and what not. i am trying to get in there with out totally dismantling the hinge. but besides that makes perfect meat and chicken and pretty much everything i've but into this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique T. Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Makes food tastes BETTER.
customer_reviews.text: This grill is great. My son and husband eat chicken and steaks cooked on this grill like they've never eaten them before. I had to ge used to how long to cook food on it so its really your preference but it does keep food from being dry and removes the fat in the drop pan. The price was too great to pass up too. Been wanting one for a while but needed a large one for my BIG 'OLE boys meals and I am so glad I got it. Cooks fast and if you clean while it is a little warm still it is very easy.
customer_reviews.author: B Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very good product will recommend to anyone. Use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: edwin estrada

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without it???
customer_reviews.text: Baby, I don't know what took me so long to invest in this grill. So far, I've grilled hotdogs, sausages, hamburgers, and pork chops. This baby is A-MAZING. Best thing ever.
customer_reviews.author: LadyV

customer_reviews.title: Great grill but...
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved the George Foreman Grill. I've owned 2 others before this one. My only complaint is that this version doesn't have temperature control like my last two. I guess I'll have to check my food more often to prevent burns. The temperature control should be on ALL models but It's up to the manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: Joey S.

customer_reviews.title: I had an large older model that lasted over 10 yrs. I doubt this will last 1.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap construction! Lid cracked the first week. The whole machine warps when fully heated and will not rest flat on counter top until it cools back down.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany J.

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold 9 servings
customer_reviews.text: Plates are 11.5 inches by 6.5 inches usable area each. If you use it as grill (with burgers between top and bottom) it only holds 5 small burgers not 9. Nonstick surface to not really non-stick, burgers stick to grill, hard to wash off.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: dont buy
customer_reviews.text: gosh this thing is messy & have burned myself a few times already as its so cumbersome to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grilling fish and minimizing the smell
customer_reviews.text: We bought the grill for cooking fish. Works great. Fish is done in 4 to 5 minutes. There is less fish smell than baking or frying. We have followed other posters' suggestions and put a wet soapy dishcloth on the grill and close it to ease clean up. We let it sit an hour or so and are able to get the grill super clean without scraping. Cleaning does take patience as there are a lot of "nooks and crannies".
customer_reviews.author: carol j. glassel

customer_reviews.title: This product is Hot.  Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: This is always a great product it’s a little bigger than I imagined I guess I didn’t Take the measurements into consideration but the product is wonderful. Fast easy cooking anyone can use.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Decent but no temperature control
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent little cooker but would have been much better if it had temperature control as my last one did
customer_reviews.author: Mr Country

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds all expectations
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should have one Best purchase ever for cooking all meats !!!’
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Just upgraded to this larger grill from the basic one. Happy with it so far. I wish it had a timer instead of just "on when plugged in" but it's not the end of the world. As long as you dont let stuff dry on it, cleanup is relatively easy. For someone that hates cooking and wants something quick and easy for burgers, steaks, grilled cheeses, etc, this is a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: The plates are not removable and it takes up room on the kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Returned and will be buying the grill I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Elabella

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the size, I would have liked one at least as big or bigger than my last George Forman grill.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Anglada

customer_reviews.title: Hmm average
customer_reviews.text: Food sticks and not so easy to clean. That said, however, it does cook fast.
customer_reviews.author: BandDFig

customer_reviews.title: Great unit....
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this unit... It is worth every penny! Vacuum system works incredibly well and it seals it without any air leaks! I do recommend to purchase the pre-sealed bags for us is the rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Coulombe

customer_reviews.title: Best if cleaned when still warm but have to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Cooks very quick but not really the easiest to clean. Best if cleaned when still warm but have to be careful not to get burnt. Tried both warm and cold cleaning. Cold is not easy due to food sticking even though I use pam on the surface. Over all I like it and use it atleast 2 a week for fish and burgers. Would recommend especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Good grill but doesn't heat evenly
customer_reviews.text: Nice grill. Easy to clean. I deducted a star because it doesn't heat evenly. The edges do not seem to heat up as much as the rest of the grill so if you are cooking a lot of food you should move it around to get it to cook evenly. The hinged lid is nice. It enables to get larger items under the grill
customer_reviews.author: cville77

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grill
customer_reviews.text: This thing is HUGE. We were surprised how much bigger than our old one. It works just as good as our old one we had for 8 years. The first time we used it we made burgers for 5 people and it got 3# of burgers all one time
customer_reviews.author: M. Hoenigman

customer_reviews.title: Taste matters
customer_reviews.text: So it's the taste of the meat on the grill that's different...other than that loved
customer_reviews.author: John Bechtelheimer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I adore this machine. I can grill so many things with easy and it tastes great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware
customer_reviews.text: After this product was sitting in the box for a couple of weeks, the one time I decided to use it was nothing like I attended. I plugged it in and it was already on high. After I put my chicken on to grill, the lid almost fell of after I closed it down. Not only that, the product doesn't have and on/off swith nor does it have a temp a ture regulate for different proteins. This was not worth paying for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Directions say that it has an on/off switch, however ...
customer_reviews.text: Directions say that it has an on/off switch, however the product has no switch. Causes a spark when I unplug. Contact the manufacture and receive new model which also doesn't have an on/off switch.
customer_reviews.author: Young Prime

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I put off buying something like this for years, until someone suggested that I should stop complaining about not being able to cook steaks in my apartment. I really didn't need one quite this big, but the price was right and I ordered it. I haven't had a single regret yet. Steak, burgers, sausages - they all cook up great on this grill! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Bradfield

customer_reviews.title: Works extremely well and cooks great meals! As temperature cannot be controlled
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well and cooks great meals! As temperature cannot be controlled, it may be easy to overcook burgers and filets in the beginning. There is definitely a learning curve! Clean up can be a pain as the plates are not removable. But investing in a $10 electric grill brush and oiling the grill prior to cooking greatly helps! Definitely would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Tino

customer_reviews.title: No thermostat to control cooking temperature.
customer_reviews.text: This grill would be great if it had a thermostat. Love the size of it. No way to regulate it. It just gets hot and stays hot. Next time I'll look for one with a thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: poolbob

customer_reviews.title: The power cord is too short
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 5 stars, however the power cord for this grill is super short. Otherwise it's a great large grill and easy to clean after each use.
customer_reviews.author: S. Glover

customer_reviews.title: But it grills nicely for anything from burgers to paninis
customer_reviews.text: This is a little harder to clean than the original small George Forman griller. But it grills nicely for anything from burgers to paninis.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Korte

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: It's a George foreman grill nothing else needs to be said except stay away from the others
customer_reviews.author: Gary Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! Simple, sturdy, easy to use .
customer_reviews.author: rebekah spotts

customer_reviews.title: We use this almost daily and have cooked pretty much everything you can think of on it
customer_reviews.text: We use this almost daily and have cooked pretty much everything you can think of on it. It hearts up quickly and cleans easily. This is our third George Foreman grill - we went with a larger size to accommodate new family members.
customer_reviews.author: Sunflowerstars

customer_reviews.title: Big and fast
customer_reviews.text: I use this alot. I lost my old one in Harvey flood. One of the first things I had to have back to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Howard

customer_reviews.title: Please GO BIGGER
customer_reviews.text: Good machine but not for the family it's to small for a family of five . It barely fits a pack of hotdogs and a couple of burgers . Forget about ring sausage only one can go at a time my old one fit two perfectly .the one I had before they don't make so I had to settle for this one.
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Its alot less messy than using a frying pan.
customer_reviews.author: Vincenzo A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Grilling Machine
customer_reviews.text: This is my second George Foreman indoor grill, the first one lasted almost 8 years. product is durable and food comes out tasting great with plenty of moisture. Grill never dries out your steaks. You can grill a variety of foods with this grill. The only downside is that the grill is hard to clean due to the grilling surface not being removable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the larger size I can cook a lot at one time fast and easyFast and easy
customer_reviews.text: I love the larger size I can cook a lot at one time fast and easy
customer_reviews.author: Don Little

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad little grill
customer_reviews.text: This grill does a great job of grilling burgers steaks and hot dogs, brats and sausages. By grilling inside the closed lid, you avaoid all the splatters of pan frying. Clean up is fairly easy. I hang the edge over the sink and wipe down with a sponge. As others have said, clean-up is easier when unit is just a bit warm.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Vandersteeg

customer_reviews.title: George Forman grill
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic grill! You can have flat, crispy or chewy bacon in just about 8 minutes! It does a fantastic job on all meats! I have even made asparagus, and onions etc.... On it! Very much worth the money, just a little aggravation cleaning it! But it is worth the trouble,
customer_reviews.author: Dreama J.

customer_reviews.title: George Foreman Grill G144
customer_reviews.text: I love the G144 grill because of the size, I can cook for several people at once. Hamburgers cook in about 4 to 5 minutes and the grease from fat runes off in a tray away from the meat. Another good thing I got a great price at Amazon so buy from here with total confidence.
customer_reviews.author: William C.

customer_reviews.title: Used it for a good portion of the summer
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a good portion of the summer. It is great and I can grill large portion for my family. I would have given 5 stars but you have to hold it up when melting the cheese on the burger so it doesn't go on the top part of the grill. The original George Forman grill you are able to adjust the grill and you can melt cheese without it getting on the top part of the grill.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Family Size Foreman Grill
customer_reviews.text: This is really great for cooking good grilled meat in a short amount of time especially if you like your meat grilled and can't always get outside to grill. I cook 4 large chicken breasts at one time. Easy to clean if you wipe it down as soon as you remove the meat.
customer_reviews.author: ginbfun

customer_reviews.title: A big hit!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my brother for Christmas. His old one finally wore out. It's sleak and atractive. The grill is very spacious. He can grill a man-sized steak without any problem. And he loves the way it grills his veggies! Easy cleanup as with all Forman Grills. Perfect for a family grill.
customer_reviews.author: GranJan

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this! It’s large enough for camping trips with the family. Very easy to clean & store and it cooks very evenly.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Cooks 7 frozen hamburger patties at once!
customer_reviews.text: We mostly use it to cook frozen hamburger patties and can fit 7 on the grill at once. To cook them all evenly we have to rotate them on the grill because certain areas cook hotter than others. But overall it has been a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie Baros

customer_reviews.title: No TEMP CONTROL !
customer_reviews.text: Beware, there is no Temp control !!!!! I read comments about this item for for some reason I did not see there there was NO TEMP CONTROL. That is just ridiculous.It was made in 2011. I cant cook things that are too thick! My meat gets burned easily. I will try to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Game Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love LOVE THIS GRILL
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love LOVE THIS GRILL!!! Would it be easier if it came apart to wash? Sure, is it hard to clean, Nope! Get it! P.S. I made steaks ( NY Strips) the other night, quick and tender! 😬
customer_reviews.author: Geniene

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this grill because it said it has an on/off switch. It even says that it has one in the instructions that came with it. But there is no on/off switch that I can find anywhere. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Custer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the fact that I could not clean it easily. The heating plates are attached to the electrical unit and it is difficult to clean, therefore very discouraging to using it!
customer_reviews.author: Structural Prof

customer_reviews.title: no heat control  burns things
customer_reviews.text: very dissaponted in this unit nothing like my old george foreman
customer_reviews.author: robbie ridge

customer_reviews.title: No power switch
customer_reviews.text: Works great only problem is it doesn't have a power switch. The box says it does and I spent like 30 min looking and never found it so I just have to pull the cord and I did see sparks when I pulled it. Other than that it works great cooks my food really good
customer_reviews.author: Anthony E

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Built, But Does Work.
customer_reviews.text: It does it's job, but it's smaller than the last large Foreman grill we had, and it's very flimsy. It feels like the top will just pop off at any moment.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon D

customer_reviews.title: WIsh someone could help from the GF Grills....?? No contact info for seller.
customer_reviews.text: I did not get a drip tray with my item and I used the straight tray from my old family unit however the drips continue to end up on the counter. No idea what the issues is???
customer_reviews.author: Jenn - Texas

customer_reviews.title: I love the George Foreman grill
customer_reviews.text: I love the George Foreman grill. I grill everything on it. This is not my first grill. I use it almost everyday, so I've gone through a few of them already. I recommend this grill for everybody who wants less fat in their diet. It cooks food evenly and completely. Best grill ever!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A Walker

customer_reviews.title: George Forman GR144 Family Size Grill
customer_reviews.text: This is my third George Forman Grill. The one I had prior to this one was a smaller size but it had temperature control and removable grill plates. I just loved it except it was a little too small. This new one is a great size but does not have temperature control, just an on off switch and the plates do not remove. I wish I could find a large one with the other two features. I will continue to use the GR144 until I find a new George Forman. I did consider another brand but for the price of the George Forman and the quality of the grilling you cann't get a better grill.
customer_reviews.author: granny h

customer_reviews.title: Saves time cooking rather than a stove
customer_reviews.text: Great to cook for a family. Didn’t like that it had no temperature control.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: much more cooking space than normal grills.
customer_reviews.text: We really did like our steaks grilled on the George Foreman and the cooking time is great.
customer_reviews.author: Betty M. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: George Foreman GR-144 Nonstick Family-Size Grill.
customer_reviews.text: The George Foreman Grill is perfect for my family we use it quite often and it is not heavy when we move it. I can now cook more than one hamburger at a time and other food items. This is a very good grill,I have no complaints.Would I tell others to purchase it, YES.
customer_reviews.author: . Warrwpen

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me and my kids... cooks evenly and quickly. Clean up is quick
customer_reviews.author: Jason Beck

customer_reviews.title: No more grilling in the snow!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grand-daughter and her family for Christmas. It is large enough for her to grill for the whole family, and she absolutely loves it. No more trying to fire up the grill in 5 feet of snow. The grill is easy to use and easy to clean. I own one these myself and use it often. I highly recommend the Foreman grill.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Harte

customer_reviews.title: Wow I like it!
customer_reviews.text: From the first 15 minutes after I opened the package I've been thrilled at the Gary Coleman Grill! Seriously, convenient and no thinking required. Hamburgers in 4 minutes, Steaks in 5, Pork chops in 6, Chicken in 7! (had to pound the chicken into thinner patties to tenderize and make them the same thickness). Bacon, sausage, grilled cheese! all came out great! I guess I would give it a thumbs up! And with a wife that cleans up the Grill it's like self cleaning! lol
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Apuan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I cook 6 (large) chicken breasts at a time each week.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It's not like the fancy grills with exchanging plate or temperature controls. Just plug in, the light turns on when ready. And place your food. Fitts about 5 hamburger patties from Costco at one time. Easy, easy clean up. Cooks without all that grease splatter. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alma Amazon

product_meta.title: George Foreman 9-Serving Classic Plate Electric Grill and Panini Press, Silver, GR144
product_meta.description: Style Name:Horizontal Storage with Fixed HingeEntertain like a pro! The George Foreman 9-Serving Classic Plate Electric Grill and Panini Press delivers fast grilling and delicious results for steak, burgers, chicken, veggies, sandwiches, and more. The proprietary sloped surface helps remove fat during cooking, and the George Tough nonstick coating wipes clean after every use. The large cooking area combines with dual contact heating to speed up grilling and get food on the table in record time. What will you make on your George Foreman Grill.
feature_bullets: Family-Sized - Feed the whole family, with leftovers to spare! The 144 square inches of grilling surface lets you make up to nine servings at a time
George Tough Nonstick Coating - There’s a lot to love about this nonstick coating; it’s durable, easy to clean, and removes the need for butter and oil
Fat-Removing Slope -The sloped grilling surface helps remove up to 42% of fat for lean, tasty meats, slope removes up to 42% of fat from 1/4lb. 80/20 ground chuck

Drip Tray - The dishwasher-safe drip tray collects excess fat and grease so you don’t have to.Close the lid and plug cord into outlet. Allow grill to preheat for 5-8 minutes.To disconnect, remove plug from wall outlet
Ready Indicator Light - Indicator lights on the top of the grill let you know when it’s plugged in and when it’s ready to cook.
ADJUSTABLE HINGE: We’re all about that slope, but we know a flat surface can come in handy.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,088 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
